channel.title: Joyce Bateman
channel.description: Recent news about Joyce Bateman, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Winnipeg Free Press
item.description:
Scientist miffed Tory MP takes credit for saving ELA
SUPPORTERS of the Experimental Lakes Area are fuming at a new flyer from Winnipeg Conservative MP Joyce Bateman that takes credit for solving a problem her government created. The flyer, which arrived in mailboxes late last week, offers an update on ...
